item.title: System Design Interview - Top K Problem - Heavy Hitters
item.description: An in-depth guide to the Top K Problem and Heavy Hitters in system design interviews. Explore exact and approximate solutions, distributed system considerations, and real-world applications for finding the most frequent elements in large datasets and data streams.
